keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eluned wants to fix our NHS. She’ll fight for more nurses, better treatment for people with mental health and improved access to your GP.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A plan to clean up Cardiff
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cardiff’s streets are a mess. Fly-tipping has increased under Labour. Eluned has a plan to end fly-tipping and clean up Cardiff.
Labour’s housing plans are going to bring more traffic chaos to your area. Eluned is fighting for the transport links and schools needed for new homes.
Eluned has helped get extra funding for local schools. She wants clear class sizes for infants to early years made smaller with high quality school meals.

mentions.tacticalSituation: 38 votes in it between the Lib Dems and Labour. Only the local Lib Dem Eluned Parrott can beat Labour here. Conservatives, and Plaid can’t win.

issues.economy: Wales is the only part of the UK where average weekly earnings have fallen
issues.education: Eluned has helped get extra funding for local schools. She wants clear class sizes for infants to early years made smaller with high quality school meals.
issues.environment: Eluned has a plan to end fly-tipping and clean up Cardiff.
issues.health: Eluned wants to fix our NHS. She’ll fight for more nurses, better treatment for people with mental health and improved access to your GP. NHS Wales: Waiting times worse than in England.

housing.content: Labour’s housing plans are going to bring more traffic chaos to your area. Eluned is fighting for the transport links and schools needed for new homes.

endorsements.endorsement: I am supporting Eluned as we need our next AM to focus on day-to-day issues in our local community.
Eluned stands up for what matters to me. From fighting for better treatment for mental ill health to campaigning to clean up Cardiff - she’s always on the side of local people.

quotes.text: Wales is the only part of the UK where average weekly earnings have fallen
Wales has fallen behind the rest of the UK significant reducing maths and science, for the third time.
NHS Wales: Waiting times worse than in England.

images.caption: Eluned Parrott, a strong voice for Cardiff with supporters and constituents.
